mapper.select: select nno, ntitle, ncontent, ndate, m_no, m_id, ndel, norifile, nrealfile from notice
mapper.insert: insert into notice (ntitle, ncontent, m_id , norifile, nrealfile) values (#{title}, #{content}, #{m_id} , #{norifile}, #{nrealfile})
mapper.select: select b_no, mb_cate, b_catename, b_url, b_comment from setupboard
mapper.insert: insert into setupboard (mb_cate, b_catename, b_url, b_comment) values (#{cateNum}, #{name}, concat('./multiboard?board=', #{cateNum}), #{comment})
